metadata.name: The Saffron King
metadata.description:
The Saffron King merges the mythological significance of saffron as a symbol of power and wealth with its culinary use, adding to the understanding of this vibrant spice.  The blending of these two worlds creates a sensory experience that evokes the richness and complexity of saffron, connecting us to the stories and traditions that have been woven around it throughout history
